ExportDataConfig.name: export KPIs data
ExportDataConfig.title: "KPI Id"; "Objective Id"; "Name"; "Weight"; "Target"; "Min"; "Unit"; "Formula Id"; "Management method( 1-bigger is better, 2-smaller is better, 3-quasi is better )"; "compare type( 1-Target, 2-Min )"; "Calculation method"; "Data type( 1-organization, 2-personal, 3-both )"; "measure-data for Organization"; "measure-data for Personal"; "QUASI-range(0, 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50)"; "Description"; "Max"; "Trends-Formula Id"; "Activate( Y, N )"
ExportDataConfig.sql: select ID, OBJ_ID, NAME, WEIGHT, TARGET, MIN, UNIT, FOR_ID, MANAGEMENT, COMPARE_TYPE, CAL, DATA_TYPE, ORGA_MEASURE_SEPARATE, USER_MEASURE_SEPARATE, QUASI_RANGE, DESCRIPTION, MAX, TRENDS_FOR_ID, ACTIVATE from bb_kpi order by ID asc limit 500
ExportDataConfig.description: export KPIs data to csv file.
